definitions.definition: (of materials, products, etc.) Not treated or processed; in a natural state, unrefined, unprocessed.
Having had the skin removed or abraded; chafed, tender; exposed, lacerated.
Crude in quality; rough, uneven, unsophisticated.
(of an emotion, personality, etc.) Unmasked, undisguised, strongly expressed
Candid in a representation of unpleasant facts, conditions, etc.
definitions.example: a raw description of the American political arena

definitions.definition: (of language) Unrefined, crude, or insensitive, especially with reference to sexual matters
